nodes.text: Chenini was a moon of Tatooine. It had a large, elliptical orbit which took it as far as four million miles away from Tatooine at apogee, causing it to be overlooked on many planetary surveys.

The erratic appearance and disappearance of this celestial body led to many superstitions: Tusken Raiders planned rituals around the moon's cycle, while Jawas used the moons just before storm season to time their annual swap meets.
Chenini is also the name of a real village near Tataouine in Tunisia, where most Tatooine scenes were filmed.
